juzs.text: Gedha s Win Ibbwin amdan iS, d iminig n yiv, si Loamaa n Leaoam, ar Loamaa ibaaden mavi, ideg Neoqa i as d izzin, iwakken ad as Nessken, seg issekniyen nne£. Ih, Neppa, d Win Isellen, Ipwalin
Nefka Tazmamt i Musa, u Nerra p d nnhaya i At Isoail. "Ur saut awkil, war Nek
D tarwa n wid i Nebbwi akked Nue. Neppa, s tidep, d amdan isnemmiren
Nsseyya di Tezmamt, i At Isoail: "war ccekk, a ppesfesdem, di tmurt, berdayen, u aias ara tesme$woem iman nnwen
Mi d iusa usefsed amenzu segsen, Nuzen awen d imdanen nne£, s loehd uqsie, kecmen ixxamen; lemaahda tevoa
Sinna, Nerra d ppao nnwen, segsen. Nebbwi yawen d ayla, tarwa. Nesiuqqet iasekoiwen nnwen
Ma tmaanem, i iman nnwen, ma tdensem, i iman nnwen. Mi d tusa lemaahda taneggarut, ssexven udmawen nnwen, kecmen Loamaa, akken i t kecmen abrid amenzu; hudden, wakali, ayen is ipzuxxun
Ahat Mass nnwen ad Ieun fellawen. Ma tulsem, a Nales. Nerra Loahennama d leebs i ijehliyen
Ih, Leqwoan agi inehhu ar wayen iweqmen mavi, ibecceo lmumnin i ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ar i nitni akafi meqqwoen
Wanag wid ur numin ara s laxeot, Nhegga yasen d aaaqeb aqeoean
Amdan issawal i cceoo, akken issawal i lxio. Amdan izga d aeemmaq

Nerra, iv akked wass, d sin issekniyen. Assekni n yiv Nerra d tellis, Nerra win n wass d win ipwalin, iwakken a pnadim lfevl n Mass nnwen, a ppissinem amvan iseggwasen, akked leesab. Yal ta$awsa, Nfeuuel ip akken iwata
I yal amdan, Ncudd as lbext is s amgarv is. Ass n tnekra, ad as d Nessuffe$ tazmamt ara iaf teldi
£eo tazmamt ik! Tqaddev, assa, s yiman ik, i uqeiii k
Win ipwanhan, i iman is kan, win innetlafen, innetlaf mgal iman is kan. Ur ipbibbi yiwen taakkwemt n wayev. Ur Nekkat, alamma Nuzen amazan
Ma Neb$a a Nesqucc tamdint, Neppak lameo i isaiyen is, ad xedmen, degs, cceoo. Ad iaaddi fellas Wawal, a p Nhudd wakali
Aceal n tsuta ay Nesqucc, deffir Nue! Ad Iqadd Mass ik, i tussna akked tmeeoiwt ibekkaven n imdanen iS
Win ib$an taeemmaqt, Nezzazzal as degs, i £ ihwan, i win i £ Neb$a. Sinna, Nerra yas Loahennama ad din io$, indell, ippuveggeo
Win ib$an laxeot, iaazem fellas yal laazem, u neppa iumen; widak, tajmilt i laazem nnsen
I akw, i wigi d wiyav, Nwessaa tikci s$uo Mass ik. Tikci n Mass ik, ur meedudet
Wali amek Nesmenyaf kra i wiyav. War ccekk, di laxeot, lfeoq d usmenyef, ad ilin sennig waya
Ur sau, ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven, mulac a ppu$alev d imdelli, d imveggaa
Iseyya d Mass ik: ur taabdem siwa Neppa, elhut ar imawlan. Ma, $uoek wesser yiwen, ne$ ma wessren i sin, ur asen qqao: "ttfuh"! Ur ten ppara. Mmeslay asen s lkyasa
Zger fellasen tacvat n lmaenana. Ini: "a Mass iw! Eun fellasen, akken iyi d ssekren d amejtue
Mass nnwen Yif akw akken Issen, i illan deg iman nnwen. Ma telham, Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmie wid isteooiaen
Efk i llezm ik amur is, akw i ume$bun akked win d ibbwi ubrid. Ur pjeggie d ajeggee
Ijeggaeen, s tidep, d atmaten n Cciian. Cciian ijhel ar Mass is
Ma tfuoqev ten, toe$bev u tegguniv aeunu s$uo Mass ik, ini yasen awal aeidan
Ur pcuddu afus ik ar yiri k, ur as berru aias, mulac a ppu$alev d ambaui, d ame$bun
S tidep, Mass ik I$ennu win i S ihwan, u Iwezzen. Neppa, s tidep, Ipwali, Issen imdanen iS
Ur Neqqet arraw nnwen, ma tugadem tiggulelt. D Nekwni ara ten Ioezqen, kunwi yidsen. Ih, timen$iwt nnsen d tucmip meqqwoen
Ur zennut, d ayen n dir, d abrid ucmit
Ur neqqet amdan i wen Igdel Oebbi, siwa ma di tidep. Win ipwan$an s le$deo, ihi, a Nefk adabu i walag is. Ur ipjuoou di tmen$iwt, ihi, neppa, ad ippusellek
Ur pnalet ayla ugujil, siwa ar wayen imaanen, ar d immeetel. Qadoet lemaahda; ih, lemaahda s usteqsi
Qadoet lkil ma tektalem, weznet s lmizan imaanen. Yif it wakka, a ppelhu taggara
Ur iiafao ayen ur tessinev. Timejjin, ieoi, ul, s tidep, ad ppuseqsin akw
Ur teddu di tmurt, d amzuxxi. Ih, kecc ur tezmirev, d awez$i, a pneqoev tamurt, ne$ a ppessiwvev laali idurar
Adiran, deg waya akw, Ikerh it Mass ik
Ayagi, seg wayen i k Iweeea Mass ik, n uuwab. Ur ppara, ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven, mulac a ppepwaveggoev ar Loahennama d ambaui, d amnafeq
Day wen d Ifren Mass nnwen arrac, u Iddem, i iman iS, tullas, si lmalayek? S tidep, kunwi tegrem d awal anecilat
Ih, ay d Nebbwi di Leqwoan agi, iwakken a d mmektin. I yasen d irna, siwa a$unfu
Ini: "lemmer llin yides ioebbiten, akken la d qqaoen, yili ad nadin abrid ara ten iawin ar n Bab n usgeld
Gedha s yiS, aias i Aalay sennig wayen d qqaoen
Ppanzen aS igenwan di ua, tamurt, u wayen illan degsen. Ur illi wayen ur aS neppanez, ur T Nesbuccua s ccekoan. Maca, ur tfehmem ara annuz nnsen. Ih, Neppa Ieellem, Ipsemmie
Mara teqqaoev Leqwoan, Neppara, garak d wid ur numin ara s laxeot, aeurrim abavni
Nerra $ef ulawen nnsen ssteo, iwakken ur t fehmen; di tmejjin nnsen, tiaeegt. Ma tesmektiv d, di Leqwoan, Mass ik d Yiwen, ad zzin akin, s u$unfu
Nekwni, Nif akw akken Neeoa, acu iwumi sellen, mara k ssemeasen, mara hedoen, mi qqaoen imednas: "la teppeddum kan d urgaz iwumi sseeren
Wali amek i k d bbwin imedyaten. Nnetlafen. Ur zmiren ad afen abrid
Nnan: "day mi nu$al d i$san, d a$webbao, d uuee a d nu$al di lxelq amaynut
Ini: "ilit d azou ne$ d uzzal

ne$ d lxelq id iusan deg idmaren nnwen". A d inin: "anwa ara a $ d irren"? Ini: "d Win ikwen id Ixelqen, abrid amenzu". Ad huzen iqweooa nnsen $uoek, ad inin: "melmi ayagi"? Ini: "izmer ad yili iqeob ed
Ass ideg ara awen d Isiwel, a d tjawbem s ccekoan iS, a p$ilem cwii kan ay teqqimem
Ini i imdanen iw ad inin awal ifuqen. Cciian, s tidep, isskar ameoei garasen. Ih, Cciian d acengu n uuee i umdan
Mass nnwen Yif akw akken ikwen Issen. Ad Ieun fellawen, ma Ib$a; a kwen Iaaqeb ma Ib$a. Ur k id Nuzen ara d awkil nnsen
Mass ik Yif akw akken Ieoa i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Ni$ Nesmenyaf kra n lambiyya i wiyav. I Dawed Nefka Ihellilen
Ini: "nujet $eo wid tepkabarem, war Neppa. Ur zmiren ad awen kksen ccqa, ne$ a t bedlen
Wigi u$uo la pnujun, la pqelliben ppawil ara ten isqeoben nezzeh ar Mass nnsen. Ssaramen aeunu S, ppagwaden aaaqeb iS". Ih, aaaqeb n Mass ik, issagwad
Ur telli temdint ur Nesquccu, uqbel ass n tnekra, ne$ ur Naaqeb s leqsee. Ayagi iura di Tezmamt
I £ iiifen $ef uceggaa issekniyen, d nnkeo nnsen, kan, s$uo imezwura. Nuzen ed tal$wemt i Tamud, d ayen pwalin. Densen p. Ur d Neppazen issekniyen siwa i ussigwed
Mi k Nenna: "Mass ik, s tidep, Izzi i imdanen". Ma dayen i k Nerra teeoiv t, d ahewwel kan i medden. Akken ttejoa tamenault di Leqwoan. Nessagwad iten. Ay sen d irennu siwa nnfaq ameqwoan
Mi Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem", knant, siwa Iblis. Inna: "day ad knu$ i win Txelqev s talaxt
Inna: "Twalav wagi i Tauzzev sennig iw, lemmer a yi Teooev, ar ass n tnekra, war ccekk, ad $wu$ tarwa s, siwa ixeiiayen
Inna: "Oue! Wid, segsen, i iddan yidek, ihi, aqeiii nnwen d Loahennama, d aqeiii meqqwoen
Laaaj win iwumi tzemoev, degsen, s ta$wect ik. £ewwes fellasen s imnayen ik, d iterrasen ik. Ecrek yidsen ayla, tarwa. Aahed asen". I yasen iaahed Cciian, siwa a$uoou
Ma d imdanen iW, ur tesaiv adabu fellasen". Mass ik Iqadd d Awkil
Mass nnwen, i wen Isseleayen lbabuo di yill, a pnadim lfevl iS. Ih, Neppa Ipeunu fellawen
Ma tevoa yidwen lmuuiba di yill, ayen u$uo tepnujum, war Neppa, ittellif. Mi kwen Isellek ar lberr, twexxoem. Amdan izga d lkaraa
Day t$ilem ur Ipseggix ara tamurt yiswen, ne$ ur awen d Ippazen ara tabucivant, d$a ur teppafem awkil
Ne$ day t$ilem ur kwen id Ippara ara tikelt nniven, ad awen d Iazen aueouao, a kwen I$mes ilmend n tijehli nnwen, sinna ur teppafem, mgal a£, amalal
Ni$ Nkeyyes tarwa n Adem. Nebbwi ten di lberr, di yill, N$at iten s wayen ilhan, Nesmenyaf iten, nezzeh, i waias seg wid i Nexleq
Ass ideg ara Nenced akw imdanen, s imveboen nnsen; win id tusa tezmamt is yeffus is, widak ad $oen tazmamt nnsen, ur pwadensen s tissegnit
win illan d ader$al di tagi, ad yili d ader$al di laxeot, ad izid di tuff$a n ubrid
S tidep, qoib i k hewwlen $ef wayen i k d Nweeea, a d tesnulfuv ayen nniven, mgal a£. D$a, a k rren d aebib
Lemmer ur k Ntebbet ara, qoib tmalev cwii $uosen
Yili ad ak Nesaaddi tudert akked tmeppant, berdayen, sinna, ur teppafev, mgal a£, w ara k isellken
Ih, qoib i k id srewlen si tmurt, a k id ssuff$en segs. Yili cwii kan ara d gwrin, deffir ek
D tannumi imazanen nne£, id Nuzen, uqbel ik. Ur teppafev ara abeddel, di laadda nne£
Bedd i teallit mi istu$la yiiij, alamma d tellis n yiv. Leqwoan, tafrara. Ih, Leqwoan, tafrara, isaa inagan
Aawez yis kra n yiv, d nnafila k, amar a k id Irr Mass ik, deg umkan i pcekkioen
Ini: "a Mass iw! Ssekcem iyi, anekcum n tidep. Ssuffe$ iyi, tuff$a n tidep. Efk iyi, s$uoeK, adabu ipselliken
Ini: "tusa d tidep, $abent tkerkas. Ih, tikerkas ilaq ad $abent
Nesrusu d, si Leqwoan, ayen illan d eellu akked ueunu i lmumnin. I irennu, i imednas, siwa lexsaoa
Ma N$at amdan ad iwexxeo, ad iveooef iman is. Ma ieuza t wugur ad iayes
Ini: "yal yiwen ixeddem akken ipwali. Mass nnwen Yif akw akken i Issen anwa i ipwanhan kteo
Steqsan k id $ef ooue. Ini: "ooue si lameo n Mass iw. Drus kan n tmusni i wen ippunefken
Ma ihwa ya£, a Nekkes ayen i k Nweeea. D$a ur teppafev, mgal a£, awkil
siwa aeunu s$uo Mass ik. Ih, lfevl iS, i kecc, izga meqqweo
Ini: "lemmer ad mlilen imdanen akked leonun, iwakken a d awin am Leqwoan agi, ur d ppawin i t icban, xas maawanen
Ni$ Nefka d i imdanen, di Leqwoan agi, si yal imedyaten. Tegwti n yimdanen ur b$in, siwa tijehli
Nnan: "ur k neppamen alamma tesfeggvev a$ d a$balu, si tmurt
ne$, tesaiv leonan n tezdayin akked tfeooant, ideg feggven isaffen
ne$, a d tesse$liv igenni d ifeulan, akken i $ tzuxxev; ne$, a d tasev s Oebbi akked lmalayek, zdat nne
Ne$ a ppesauv axxam imzewweq, ne$ a ppaliv s igenni. Ur neppamen, s walluy ik, alamma tessersev ane$ d tazmamt ara n$eo". Ini: "gedha s Mass iw! Day lli$ d ayen nniven, siwa d amdan amazan
I iiifen imdanen ur uminen, mi ten id tusa nnhaya, mara d inin kan: "Iuzen ed Oebbi amdan d amazan
Ini: "lemmer llint, di tmurt, lmalayek, teddunt di laman, yili Nessers asent ed, seg igenni, lmelk amazan
Ini: "Iqadd Mass iw d Anagi, gari yidwen. Neppa, s tidep, Ipwali imdanen iS, Issen iten

Win Inha Oebbi, atan idda d ubrid. Wid Itlef, ur asen teppafev imawlan, war Neppa, d awez$i. A ten id Nefser ass n tnekra $ef udmawen nnsen, dre$len, gugmen, aaegen. Axxam nnsen d Loahennama. Mi tenqes tmes, ad asen Nernu ajajie
D wagi ay d aqeiii nnsen, imi nekoen issekniyen nne£, u nnan: "day mi nu$al d i$san, d a$webbao, a d nu$al di lxelq amaynut
Ne$, day ur walan ara ar Oebbi i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, Izmer a d Ixleq i ten icban? Irra yasen lajel, ur degs ccekk. Ur b$in imednas, siwa tijehli
Ini: "lemmer tesaim igerrujen ueunu n Mass iw, ur ten tepnalem, a ppagwadem a ten tueoofem. Amdan izga d imceeei
Ni$ Nefka, i Musa, tza issekniyen iberrzen. Steqsi At Isoail. Mi d iusa $uosen, inna yas Feraun: "a Musa! Nek, wala$, war ccekk, seeeern ak
Inna: "ni$ teeoiv ur d issers yiwen wigi, d tiftilin, siwa Mass n tmurt akked igenwan. Nek, wala$, a Feraun, war ccekk, tieeenev
Ib$a a ten ieeaa si tmurt, N$emmeq it, akked wid iddan yides, meooa
Deffir es, Nenna i At Isoail: "zed$et tamurt. Mi d tusa lemaahda n laxeot, a kwen id Nawi, d iayfat
Nessers it id s tidep. S tidep, ay d irs. Nuzen ik id, kan, i ubecceo d uneddeo
Leqwoan Nfeoq it, iwakken a t temlev i medden, s laaqel. Nessader it id, s l$eov
Ini: "amnet yis, ne$ qqimet". Ih, ma mlan t i wid tebbwev tussna, uqbel is, ad $lin $ef udmawen, knan
Ad inin: "gedha s Mass nne$! Tuao lemaahda n Mass nne
Ad $lin $ef udmawen s imeiiawen. Ad innerni wannuz nnsen
Ini: "nujet $er Oebbi, ne$ nujet $er Uenin. Akken tnujem, ineS ismawen imaanen yifen akw wiyav". Di teallit ik, ur saalay uuut ik, ur t ssrusu. Ad isker kan
Ini: "ccekoan i Oebbi, ur Nesai aqcic, ur Nesai acrik di tgelda, ur Nesai bab mgal asdullu". Ssem$weo iT yal tem$weo
Ccekoan i Oebbi, id Issersen Tazmamt, i uxdim iS. Aawaj, degs, ur Irri
Tewqem, iwakken a ppaaggen $ef ssxev uwaio, s$uoeS; u a pbecceo lmumnin ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ar nnsen warraz igerzen
Ad ilin degs, i lebda
A ppaaggen i wid innan: "Oebbi Isaa mmi S
Ur illi wayen ssnen fellas; akken, imezwura nnsen. D awal uqbie id iff$en seg imawen nnsen. D tikerkas kan ay ssawalen
Ahat a phelkev iman ik, ar loiha nnsen, a p$weblev, imi ur uminen ara s usali agi
Ni$ Nerra i illan di tmurt, d ccbaea ines, iwakken a Neeo menyif iten, ar igiten ilhan
A Nu$al a Nerr, i illan degs, d akal ibuoen
Ne$ t$ilev d At yifri kan, akked Oaqim, ay d lwehma, ger issekniyen nne£
Mi ssoen iman nnsen ilmeeiyen deg ifri, nnan: "a Mass nne$! Efk ane$ d aeunu s$uoeK; Err a$ lameo nne$ d uuwib
Deg ifri, Nesle$ imeeeu$en nnsen, aceal iseggwasen
Sinna, Nessker iten id, a Neeo anta, ger snat n trebbuyaa, i ieesben aceal qqimen
Nekwni, ad ak Neeku, s tidep, taqsii nnsen. Nitni, ih, d ilmeeiyen, umnen s Mass nnsen. Nerna yasen nnhaya
Nesseohed ulawen nnsen, mi kren nnan: "Mass nne$ d Mass n tmurt akked igenwan. Ur nepnuju, d awez$i, ar oebbi, war Neppa, mulac a d nini awal dduni
Widak d agdud nne$. Aabden ioebbiten, war Neppa. Ay$eo ur a$ d bbwin, fellasen, adabu n uuee? Anwa i idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi
Mi ten tfuoqem, nitni akked wayen aabden war Oebbi, essoet iman nwen deg ifri. Ad awen Izraa, Mass nnwen, seg ueunu S. Ad awen Iheggi amwanes i lameo nnwen

A pwaliv iiij, mi d inqeo, iwexxeo i ifri nnsen, ar yeffus. Mi i$li, ad asen iaaddi $eo zelmev. Nitni, din, di littsaa. Ayagi seg issekniyen n Oebbi. Win Inha Oebbi, neppa ipwanha; win Itlef, ur isai, d awez$i, bab ara t inhun
Ad as tiniv ukin, nitni iisen. Ntezzi ten yeffus, zelmev. Aydi nnsen, $ef umnao, ieeel ivaoen is. Lemmer a ten twaliv, ad asen trewlev, si tugdi; a k terkeb, segsen, lefqaa

Akka ay ten id Nessenker, iwakken ad mesteqsin. Inna yiwen segsen: "aceal n lweqt ay tesaaddam"? Nnan d: "nesaadda ass ne$ ur ibbwiv wass". Nnan: "Mass nnwen Yif akw akken Izoa ay tesaaddam. Aznet ar temdint, yiwen segwen, s idrimen agi nnwen. Ad iwali anwa lqut iufan mavi, ad awen d iawi ooeeq, segs. Ad ieader iman is, iwakken ur awen ipfaq yiwen
Nitni, war ccekk, ma eoan kwen, a kwen oeomen, ne$ a kwen rren ar ddin nnsen, d$a ur trebeen, d awez$i

Akka ay sen ten Nessken, iwakken ad eoen ar lemaahda n Oebbi d tidep; u, $ef yimir, ur illi ccekk. Mi mqellaan $ef lameo nnsen, nnan: "bnut axxam sennig sen. Mass nnsen Yif akw akken iten Issen". Nnan wid iwumi iaadda wawal, $ef lameo nnsen: "a nerr, ihi, lemqam sennig sen

Ad inin: "di krav yidsen, aydi nnsen d wis kue"; u ad inin: "di semus yidsen, aydi nnsen d wis sdis", pqelliben tabavnit. U ad inin: "di ua yidsen, aydi nnsen d wis iam". Ini: "Mass iw Yif akw akken Ieoa amvan nnsen. Drus kan i t ieoan". Ur pnamar fellasen, siwa $ef wayen id ivehoen. Ur ppesteqsay yiwen fellasen
Ur qqao ta$awsa a p xedme$, s tidep, azekka
siwa ma Irad Oebbi. Mmekti d Mass ik, ma teppuv. Ini: "amar ad iyi Inhu Mass iw, ar wayen yifen ayagi di uuwab
Saaddan, deg ifri nnsen, krav twinas iseggwasen, rnan tza nniven
Ini: "Oebbi Yif akw akken Ieoa, aceal saaddan. IneS tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan. Amek Neppa Ipwali, Isell! Ur sain bab, war Neppa. Ur Izdukkul yiwen i useyyi S
Mel ayen ik ed ippuweeean, si Tezmamt n Mass ik. Ur illi ubeddel deg wawal iS. Ur teppafev ssoan, war Neppa, d awez$i

Uebbeo iman ik, akked wid ipnujun ar Mass nnsen, tauebeit, tameddit, pnadin udem iS. Ur ten tekkes si ger wallen ik, a pvemaav lefnun n tmeddurt n ddunit. Ur ssemeas i win iwumi Nesse$fel ul is, ar usmekti nne£, i iddan d lhawiyya s, iwumi iffuhri lameo

Ini: "tidep s$uo Mass nnwen. Ad iamen win ib$an, ad ijhel win ib$an". Ih, Nhegga d times, i imednas; ad asen zzin ieeoouoa s. Ma ppren d, ad asen ppunefken waman am uzzal ifsin. Ad cwin wudmawen nnsen. A tissit tamcumt, a tanezdu$t tucmip
Ih, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, s tidep, ur Nveggia akafi n win ixedmen ayen ilhan

I wigi, leonanat n Aaden, ddaw sen isaffen ppazzalen. Ad qqnen, dinna, imeqyasen n ddheb, ad lsen iceiiiven izegzawen n leerir, eewcen s ddheb. Ad elen, degs, $ef imieoeen izewwqen. A lebsa laali, a tanezdu$t tumaint
Awi yasen d amedya n sin irgazen. I yiwen, Nefka snat tebeirin n teuoin, Nezzi yasent tizdayin, Nerra iger garasent
Yal tibeirt teppak ed l$ella s, ur ipxuuuu, segs, wacemma. Nesfeggev asif garasent
I$ellet ed ppemoa. Inna i umdakwel is, mi s immeslay: "$elbe$ k taokunt, iffe$ k alag
Idens iman is mi ikcem leonan is, inna: "ur cukke$ ara, d awez$i, ad iqucc wayagi
Ur cukke$ ara ad yili yimir, u ma bbwve$ ar Mass iw, ard affe$, war ccekk, ayen yifen aya, deg umekkan is
Inna yas umdakwel is, mi s immeslay: "day tnekoev Win ik Ixelqen seg wakal, sinna, si tiqqit, sinna, Imessel ik d argaz
Maca, Neppa d Oebbi, Mass iw. Ur pcarake$ yiwen, i Mass iw
Lemmer id tenniv, mi tkecmev ar tebeirt ik: akken Irad Oebbi. Ur telli tezmert siwa s$uo Oebbi. Ma twalav iyi d, nek, tifev iyi ayla, tarwa
Izmer Mass iw ad iyi d Ifk ayen i ifen tibeirt ik. A d Iazen $uoes ssxev, seg igenni, a ppu$al d aeecraruf issiccigen
ne$, ad zzren waman is, ur ten teppafev, d awez$i
Tqucc l$ella s. D$a la izeyyeo ifassen is, $ef wayen iseooef fellas. Tqucc tfeooant is. Inna: "a yamxix iw, a lemmer ur curke$ yiwen, i Mass iw
Ur as illi urbaa ara t isellken, war Oebbi. Ur isellek iman is
Akka, laanaya s$uo Oebbi, Tidep. Yif akw i ukafi, Yif akw i taggara
Awi yasen d amedya n tmeddurt n ddunit. Am aman id Nesse$li seg igenni. Ealualen yissen im$an n tmurt. D$a u$alen d asa$uo, issebruzzaa iten wavu. Ni$ Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Ayla akked dderya d ccbaea n tmeddurt n ddunit. Ar Mass ik, leulae idumen ifen ten i ukafi, ifen ten i tmeooiwt
Ass ideg ara Nesseleu idurar, a pwaliv tamurt d aza$ao. A ten Nefser, ur Neppaoa yiwen segsen
A d rsen zdat Mass ik, d leufuf: "ni$ tusam a£ d, akken ikwen Nexleq tikelt tamenzut. Irna tetebbtem ar ur awen Neppara ppaaud, d awez$i

Ters ed Tezmamt. A pwaliv ibe$wviyen s ueebbio, $ef wayen illan degs. Qqaoen: "a yamxix nne$! Acimi tazmamt agi ur teooi ayen meeeiyen, u wayen meqqwoen, armi ten teeseb"? Ufan illa wayen xedmen. Mass ik ur Idennis yiwen

Mi Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem", knant, siwa Iblis. Neppa, si leonun, iaaua lameo n Mass is. Day a ten terrem, neppa akked tarwa s, d imawlan, war Nek? U nitni d icenga nnwen! D abdil ucmit n imednas
Ur ten Rri$ d inagan n lxelq n tmurt akked igenwan, ne$ n lxelq nnsen. Ur Iiife$ im$eooqen d imaiwnen
Ass ideg ara d Yini: "neccdet wid iyI terram d icriken iW". Ad asen siwlen, ur asen d pparan. Nerra, garasen, asif n twa$it
Ibe$wviyen ad walin times. EeEuan ar nitni, degs, ara $lin. Ur ppafen, segs, tisensert
Ni$ Nefka d, di Leqwoan agi, yal amedya, i imdanen. Maca, ipnamar umdan sennig akw
D acu i iiifen imdanen ad amnen, mi ten id tusa nnhaya, u ad ste$foen Mass nnsen? Ar ten id tas kan, tin ivoan d imezwura, ne$ ar d irs, zdat sen, uaaqeb
Ur Neppazen imazanen, siwa i ubecceo d uneddeo. Wid ijehlen pnamaren, s tkerkas, iieggioen yissent tidep. Pmaaliken $ef issekniyen iW, akked wayen i$ef ppunedoen

Anwa idensen sennig win iwumi d pwafekkoen issekniyen n Mass is, iwexxeo asen, u ippu i ixdem ufus is. Ih, Nerra aeurrim $ef wulawen nnsen, ur t fehhmen; akked tiaeegt deg imeeeu$en nnsen. Ma tneccdev ten ar nnhaya, ur pwanhan, d awez$i
Mass ik Ipsemmieen, d Bab ueunu. Lemmer ad Ieud fellasen ilmend n wayen kesben, ad I$iwel ar uaaqeb nnsen. Maca, saan ppaaud, ur ppafen segs tisensert
Timdinin nni i Nesqucc mi densent, Nga ppaaud i usquccu nnsent
Mi inna Musa i uqeddac is: "ur eebbse$ alamma bbwve$ ar umlili n sin ilellen, xas ad saaddi$ tallit
Mi bbwven ar umlili nnsen, ppun aslem nnsen. Iu$al ar yill d ilelli
Mi zegren, inna i uqeddac is: "awi a$ d imekli nne$, ni$ naateb deg inig nne$ agi
Inna: "ur twalav ara, mi nreyyee ar teeout, nek ppu$ en aslem? D Cciian kan iyi isseppun ur ak nni$. Ibbwi abrid is ar yill, d lwehma
Inna: "d ayagi ay neb$a". D$a u$alen d $ef isurifen nnsen
Ufan d amdan seg imdanen nne£, iwumi Nefka aeunu s$uone£. Neslemd as tussna i illan $uone£
Inna yas Musa: "Ma ad ddu$ yidek, ad iyi teseefvev ay tesnev n uuwab
Inna d: "kecc, s tidep, ur tezmioev, yidi, a pueboev
Amek ara tueboev i wayen i$ef ur tesaiv asali
Inna: "ad iyi tafev, ma Irad Oebbi, d aueboi. Ur pnaqwame$ lameo ik
Inna: "ma teddiv yidi, ur iyi d steqsay $ef wacemma, alamma smekti$ k id fellas
Lean, armi rekben di lbabuo. Ixeoq it. Inna: "txeoqev t, iwakken ad $evuen l$aci s! Ni$ ayen txedmev d dduni
Inna: "day ur ak nni$ ara, kecc, s tidep, ur tezmioev, yidi, a pueboev, d awez$i
Inna: "ur iyi pqasa imi ppu$, ur ssukku lwaaoan $ef lameo iw
Lean, armi d mmugren ilemei. In$a t. Inna: "ten$iv amdan ur nen$i yiwen! Ni$ d ayen idensen ay txedmev
